org.trianacode.gui.hci

Class GUIEnv

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.hci.GUIEnv

  • public class GUIEnv
extends java.lang.Object
    Class GUIEnv sets stores classes which are accessed from other GUI objects e.g. a number of object need access to the main ApplicationFrame
